checkUpkeep(bytes).details: This is the function that ChainLink Keeper nodes call They look for the `upkeepneeded` to return true The following should be true in order to return true 1. Time interval should have passed (20minutes) 2. Subscription is funded with LINK 3. Auction should be in "open" state

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Sam Notes: Here is the variable equivalents : s_lastTimeStamp ====> startTime After the 20minutes is up, simply endAuction(); It will do the burn and send the tokens as well
